translation.AboutSection1: Unique hair salon - Coiffure Euro-Africain ! In addition to the regular treatments for cutting, coloring and balayage, we are specialized in extensions, keratin treatment and straightening. We are passionate about your hair - hair fashion is our passion !
translation.StraightenHome: Permanent straightening, from curly hair to permanently straight hair in a few hours
translation.ExtensionsHome: Weaving in extensions, instantly enjoy long shiny hair, extra volume in your hair! An extensive selection of Brazilian hair extensions available in the salon! (excluding the hair)
translation.KeratinHome: Treatment for damaged, frizzy or dry hair, straightening for 3 to 6 months with immediate results, straight and shiny hair in the salon. No post-treatment required.
translation.Name: Name
translation.Provide: What we can do for you
